
## General Background

Nominal prices were probably highest around 2007 and roughly were flat to slightly declining through 2015. Prices started falling around then. 


```{r large_price_over_time, fig.show = "hold", out.width = "47%", fig.cap="Nominal Price of the Large market category, by state",  fig.align = "center", echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics(here("images","exploratory","price_overstate_2.png"))
```


Commercial landings were lowest in 2009 and approximately have quadrupled over 15 years and the average sizes have increased.  The unclassified market category does not have lenght measurments from 2020-2023.


```{r market_cats, fig.show = "hold", out.width = "47%", fig.cap="Landings by market category over time",  fig.align = "center", echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics(here("images","exploratory","market_cats_over_time.png"))
```
